column1: Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in the sea areas extending from Hambantota
Winds will be north-easterly and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
Wind speed may increase up to (40-45) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending from
Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota.
The sea areas off the coasts extending from Colombo to Kankasanthurai via Puttalam and Mannar
and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota can be fairly rough at times.
